Title: Better Off Dread
Description:
It's time we go to the source, $n!

Shado-Pan marksmen keep a constant watch over the Dread Wastes from the top of the Serpent's Spine. They would surely welcome the aid of a skilled $c such as yourself.

Seek out Bowmistress Li atop the Serpent's Spine on the border of Dread Wastes.
ObjectivesText: Speak with Bowmistress Li on the Serpent's Spine.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Speak with Bowmistress Li on the Serpent's Spine.
